results.description: «أصرح للجميع إلا لك أنت وياه ما تستاهلون ».. بالفيديو.. نواف العقيدي يثير الجدل تجاه مراسل برنامج أكشن مع وليد! صحيفة المرصد"أصرح للجميع إلا أنت".. تصرف مثير للجدل من نواف العقيدي تجاه أحد الصحفيين إرم نيوزأخبار النصر اليوم | تصرف العقيدي المثير للجدل ضد أحد المراسلين، ووفاة المدرب السابق Goal.com«أصرح للجميع إلا أنت».. بالفيديو.. تصرف مثير للجدل من نواف العقيدي تجاه مراسل برنامج أكشن مع وليد! المرصد الرياضيةالعقيدي يُشعل الجدل بعد رفضه التصريح لمراسل: ما تستاهلون .. فيديو صحيفة صدى الالكترونية

results.title: Yamato Transport, Mitsubishi Fuso and TIER IV join Japanese government autonomous trucking project
results.description: TOKYO, Oct. 10, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Yamato Transport Co., Ltd. (Headquarters: Chuo-ku, Tokyo; Representative Director and President: Seiichi Awa), Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corporation (Headquarters: Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture, President and CEO: Karl Deppen; hereafter "MFTBC"), and TIER IV, Inc. (Headquarters: Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo; Representative Director and CEO: Shinpei Kato; hereafter "TIER IV") have been selected for a Japanese government project to test autonomous trucks for long-haul transportation. Featuring a tractor developed by MFTBC and TIER IV, paired with a Yamato Group trailer, the proof of concept aims to validate vehicle performance, safety and operational feasibility under real-world conditions on Yamato Group's Kanto–Kansai route. The Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism project will inform ongoing development of autonomous driving technology, paving the way for the deployment of Level 4 *1 autonomous semi-trailer trucks for long-haul operations on Yamato Group's route. Overview Period January–February 2026 Vehicle Autonomous semi-trailer truck Route Yamato Group's Kanto–Kansai transportation route Roles Yamato Transport To operate long-haul transportation at Level 2+ *2 MFTBC To supply Super Great vehicle for the development of a tractor designed for autonomous driving functions TIER IV To provide autonomous driving technology for the development of the autonomous tractor Areas of verification ● Vehicle performance, safety, and travel time ● Logistics hub services tailored to Yamato Group's operations ● Remote vehicle management operations ● Collection of baseline driving data *1 The vehicle can operate fully autonomously under specific conditions, such as designated areas, weather, or speed. *2 A human driver is in the vehicle, but the system allows hands-off operation in certain scenarios. Contact Yamato Transport Co., Ltd.Corporate Communications DepartmentTEL: 03-3248-5822 Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus CorporationGlobal Communications & Marketing DepartmentMail: fuso.news@daimlertruck.com TIER IV, Inc.Marketing Communications DepartmentMail: pr@tier4.jp
